1370: Euffemia was born in De Tuyt in 1370.
Got married to Rembrecht at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Wigboldo in 1371 at age 22.
1373: Gave birth to Ymmekine in 1373 at age 24.
1375: Gave birth to Woutgerus in 1375 at age 26.
1379: Gave birth to Stemaers in 1379 at age 30.
1380: Lost son Wigboldo when Wigboldo was 10 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Eghenonis in 1383 at age 34.
1386: Gave birth to Tetta in 1386 at age 37.
1390: Gave birth to Sipper in 1390 at age 41.
